EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-01-05 2018 IT Resolutions Send.2018 IT Resolutions
EmailTemplate.subject: How Will You Keep Your 2018 IT Resolutions?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=2018_IT_Resolutions]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
It’s a new year, and we’re sure you’ve made some resolutions – both for yourself and for your business. To kick off 2018, we made a few resolutions of our own – first and foremost to help you keep yours!
We all know how easy it is to slip up and leave your New Year’s plans to collect dust in the corner, and we could all use someone, or something, to keep us on track. Whether you are looking to get your applications into fighting shape, save big in the public cloud, finally implement that automation strategy you’ve been talking about all year or simply get some time back in your day, we’ll be by your side.
What IT resolutions are you looking to make this year?
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resolutions-healthyapps/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=2018_IT_Resolutions]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/resolutions-hybridcloud/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=2018_IT_Resolutions]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/resolutions-automate/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=2018_IT_Resolutions]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/resolutions-balance/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=2018_IT_Resolutions]]>
- The Turbonomic Team
